title: The Christmas Santa Was Sick
description: It's Christmas and Santa is Sick. Unable to deliver his gifts and treats, Santa instructs the elves to fly his sleigh with the use of his magical snow. The elves learn the use of Santa's oversized socks. Written in poetic verse and packed with beautiful illustrations, this story will capture the imagination of the young reader. Follow the exciting journey to save Christmas day!
author: Rebecca  Barrett
